title: Attend Converse College Soccer Games and Stay at Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85
text: Email This Story Printer Friendly PDF Version RSS Feed Attend Converse College Soccer Games and Stay at Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 The Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 in South Carolina offers affordable lodging for fans attending Converse College soccer games in September 2015. We are happy to welcome fans attending Converse College soccer games. SPARTANBURG, SC, August 29,   The Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 offers affordable lodging for fans attending Converse College home soccer games in September. The Valkyries were the 2014 Regular Season Conference Carolinas Champion. Converse will host the following teams in September: - 9/3- Concord - 9/22- Pfeiffer - 9/29- Columbia (SC) "We are happy to welcome fans attending Converse College soccer games," notes Dawn Allison, General Manager at the Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85. "Our Spartanburg SC hotel is convenient to Converse College and downtown Spartanburg," explains Ms. Allison. The award winning Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 features non-smoking guest rooms with Clean & Fresh Hampton Beds . Travelers will appreciate the convenience of a microwave, mini refrigerator, and free high speed Internet. The complimentary Hampton On the House Breakfast, with hot waffle station, is the perfect way to start the day. Hampton On the Run Breakfast Bags are a quick option on weekday mornings. The refreshing outdoor pool is a great place to relax and cool off. Other hotel amenities include a fitness center, 24-hour business center and guest laundry. This Hampton Inn Spartanburg South Carolina hotel received the 2015 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence Award. The Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 is located at Exit 78, close to many area attractions including Chapman Cultural Center and the Premium Outlets at Gaffney. Current lodging specials include the Weekend Getaway Package with late check out and Book Early and Save. For the 2015 Converse College soccer schedule, visit www.govalkyries.com . To book your stay at the Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85, contact (864) 577-9080 or visit online at www.HamptonInnSpartanburg.com .About Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 This Spartanburg Hotel invites guests to step back in time to the colonial era or indulge in modern luxuries and recreation in Spartanburg, South Carolina. The Hampton Inn Spartanburg Hotel on North I-85 is situated to offer easy access of the Duncan business centers and is within five minutes of Wofford College. Guests can take a short drive into Greenville to see historic landmarks or enjoy world-class entertainment. This Spartanburg hotel offers a full range of services and amenities to make your stay exceptional. For more information visit http://www.HamptonInnSpartanburg.com For all media inquiries, please contact: Allison Reinert
